verses.kjv: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
verses.ct: God's foundation stands on the holy mountains.

verses.kjv: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
verses.ct: The LORD loves the gates of Zion more than any other place where Jacob's descendants live.

verses.kjv: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
verses.ct: Wonderful things are said about you, city of God. Selah.

verses.kjv: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
verses.ct: I will mention Rahab and Babylon among those who acknowledge me: look — Philistia, Tyre, and Ethiopia — 'This person was born there.'

verses.kjv: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
verses.ct: But about Zion it will be said, 'Person after person was born in her,' and the Most High himself will make her secure.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
verses.ct: The LORD will record, as he registers the nations, 'This one was born there.' Selah.

verses.kjv: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
verses.ct: Singers and musicians alike will be there, saying, 'All my sources of joy are in you.'
